title: The Gathering: Charles White and Chicago’s South Side Community Art Center
hero_caption: <p>Charles White, printed by David Panosh, published by Hand Graphics, Ltd. <em>Sound of Silence</em>, 1978. Margaret Fisher Fund © The Charles White Archives …
short_description: A gathering at the South Side Community Art Center
list_description: A gathering at the South Side Community Art Center
description:
Saturday, June 9, 2018
Bike Tour begins at 10:30 am
Activities at the South Side Community Art Center begin at 2:00 pm

Enjoy this afternoon of activities exploring Charles White’s formative years in Chicago and his relationship to the South Side Community Art Center, a vibrant site in Bronzeville for art and community and the oldest African American art center in the United States. Take a bike tour to places that shaped Charles White, join conversations with artists, create, and and break bread with neighbors.

Presented with the South Side Community Art Center
